about_the_game:
Welcome to the relentless world of Blood Purge: Releaseburg, an immersive rogue-like experience set in a post-apocalyptic city overrun by hordes of gruesome zombies. With our exceptional release-based shooting mechanic, every encounter becomes a thrilling test of precision and strategy.

Arm yourself with a diverse array of weapons, from pistols for quick, calculated shots to rifles for strategic precision and burst-fire for close-quarters mayhem. Adapt your play style to navigate the blood-soaked streets and face various challenging enemies, each demanding a unique approach to survival.

The game's dynamic, random-generated levels ensure that no two playthroughs are ever the same, providing endless challenges and opportunities for exploration. Brace yourself for intense, visceral encounters as you wade through the blood and gore, carving your path through the unforgiving urban landscape. Blood Purge: Releaseburg promises a gripping, ever-evolving adventure where your every decision and shot can mean the difference between survival and becoming just another victim in this brutal, post-apocalyptic world.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains violence related to shooting zombies. This involves blood, killing, dying effects.

Recommended:

short_description: Battle relentless zombie hordes in this rogue-like shooter. Surviving enemy encounters demands you to focus, concentrate and act with precision and strategic thinking. Brace yourself for intense gore and blood as you navigate the post-apocalyptic city.
